title: Mac on Twitter
body: If every person on earth just recycled, stopped using plastic straws, and drove an electric car, 100 corporations would still produce 70% of total global emissions. 10:09 PM · Aug 10, 2021 · Twitter for iPhone
readable_content: - Mac (2021-08-10): If every person on earth just recycled, stopped using plastic straws, and drove an electric car, 100 corporations would still produce 70% of total global emissions.
summary:
The post highlights the fact that a few corporations are responsible for the majority of global emissions, despite the focus on individual actions like recycling and using electric cars. This suggests that the accountability should be with the corporations more than the individuals.
